channel.title: Blank server 508 help(error)
channel.description:
Every time i try to exacute my blank 508 i get an CMD error like this: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: /server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: /server. Program will exit.[/code]
The file is in Bin folder so the Bat looks like: [code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" /server pause[/code]
What aim i doing wrong? Thank you.

item.title: Blank server 508 help(error)
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

yup i changed it to that because thats what it is. if it was anything els i think it would have said: Path is not specfied.

anyone els have any other ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Blank server 508 help(error)
item.dc:creator: @iAmChase iAmChase
item.description:
@iAmChase wrote:

Is Java 6 Update 18 your Java?

Read full topic

item.title: Blank server 508 help(error)
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

Every time i try to exacute my blank 508 i get an CMD error like this:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: /server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: /server. Program will exit.

The file is in Bin folder so the Bat looks like:

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" /server pause

What aim i doing wrong? Thank you.
